title: Time trial bikes of the Tour de France
content:
It’s time trial day at the Tour de France, so we thought there’s no better time to bring you a video with some time trial bikes of the Tour.

In this video, we look an in-depth look at Tadej Pogačar’s Colnago K-One, a Specialized Shiv TT, a Cervelo P5, a BMC Timemachine and a host of tech.
author: Ronan Mc Laughlin
